law.text:
The department shall consist of:
The Office of the Commissioner, which shall include the Division of Public Relations.
The Office of the Chief Executive Officer.
The Office for Agricultural Marketing and Product Promotion, which shall include the following:
The Division of Agriculture Marketing and Agribusiness Recruitment;
The Division of Show and Fair Promotion;
The Division of Value-Added Animal and Aquaculture Production;
The Division of Value-Added Plant Production;
The Division of Agricultural Education, Farm Safety, and Farmland Preservation; and
The Division of Agritourism.
The Office for Consumer and Environmental Protection, which shall include the following:
The Division of Regulation and Inspection;
The Division of Food Distribution; and
The Division of Environmental Services.
The Office of State Veterinarian, which shall include the following:
The Division of Animal Health; and
The Division of Producer Services.
The Office for Strategic Planning and Administration, which shall include the following:
The Division of Personnel and Budget; and
The Division of Information Technology.
The State Board of Agriculture.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 26, sec. 1, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 88, sec. 1, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 264, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994; ch. 120, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994; ch. 121, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 393, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 404, sec. 33, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 447, sec. 15, effective April 12, 1982. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 295, sec. 84, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 127, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 2. -- Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 9, sec. 15. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 42a-3, 4618-17, 4618-18, 4618-79, 4618i-1.
